body:
Comment 6 by **shakeel.mahate**: 
issue #3038 which has been merged into this issue, is not related to constructors, but to
top level functions in package that are defined across multiple source files, for
example net/net.go and net/dial.go, the func Listen and func Dial defined in dial.go are
not displayed in godoc for the net pkg. This can be very confusing to Go newbies who are
trying to learn the API and figure it out from godoc.

Combined with inability to do search for implementers of Listen or even a simple search
for "func Listen" on either the golang.org search box or the search on code.google.com,
can be very frustrating to newbies.
